running_mode.comment: running mode, can only be configured as record, normal, live mode

data_server.comment: the IP address and port of server which xeye send data to

ntp_server.comment: the IP address and port of NTP time syncronization server

heartbeat_server.comment: the IP address and port of heartbeat server

playback_server.comment: the IP address and port of playback server, if addr section is empty, then playback mode is disabled

local_network_info.comment: static ip address, netmask and gateway configuration

models.comment: model_name: the name of the model, model_path: the abs path of the model file
